title: #149: Big Pharma With The Ripple Effects Podcast Ricky Varandas
description:
Thank you for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome from the Ripple Effect Podcast, Ricky Varandas to discuss the long shady history of the drug cartel Big Pharmaceutical!

Sam Tripoli's new special "Armogeddon" drops this Friday Dec 14th.
https://vimeo.com/ondemand/armogeddon

Please check out Ricky Varandas's "The Ripple Effect with Ricky Varandas!"
https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/the-ripple-effect-podcast/id713657884?mt=2
